Poll: Only Half of Michigan Voters Say Biden Is ‘Mentally and Physically’ Up to Task of the Presidency Key battleground state voters remain unsure on Joe Biden's (D) ability to "mentally and physically" handle the duties of the presidency, a Restoration PAC poll released this week found.

Zuckerberg Responds to Facebook Boycott, Will Crack Down on ‘Hateful’ Ads, Label Politicians’ Posts Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg has responded to a boycott from major advertisers including consumer giant Unilever, which have pulled ads from the social network in an attempt to force the platform to censor more constitutionally protected speech.
